discussion.author: rayegun
discussion.text:
[noblock]

Can this be merged over the name requirements? It's a sister to CHOLMOD, AMD, UMFPACK, etc. The full name is a joke (Clark) Kent LU and it is never referred to as such.

discussion.author: ChrisRackauckas
discussion.text: This name is fine since it matches the standard for wrapper packages, i.e. it's wrapping a package called KLU so KLU.jl is the clear choice. Looks like it's just about time for the 3 day mark so I'll merge.
